analyzed: de dag gi dge ba'i chos rnams la bar chad bgyi ba'i slad du bdud sdig can glags lta ba dang / skabs tshol bas glags rnyed par yang mi 'gyur ba dang / nga rgyal chom bar yang 'gyur ba dang / gzungs thob par yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: Māra, the evil one, will not find an opportunity to harm their virtuous qualities, nor will he find a chance to look for a weakness. They will overcome pride and attain dhāraṇī.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem po dag dpyod pa la mkhas par yang 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad kyi gsang ba'i sgor 'jug par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gter yang dag par ston par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul @197b la 'jug par yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ldem po dag dpyod pa la mkhas par yang 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad kyi gsang ba'i sgor 'jug par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gter yang dag par ston par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul @197b la 'jug par yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will become skilled in analyzing the intentions of the thus-gone ones, they will enter the secret doors of all phenomena, they will reveal the treasures of the thus-gone ones, they will enter the way of the thus-gone ones,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu srin du yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhung lugs kyi nang du chud par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu 'phrul gsang ba'i srung mar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung brjod par yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu srin du yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhung lugs kyi nang du chud par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgyu 'phrul gsang ba'i srung mar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung brjod par yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: they will become sea monsters in the ocean of the thus-gone ones, they will be included in the system of the thus-gone ones, they will become guardians of the secret magical displays of the thus-gone ones, they will speak the words of the thus-gone ones,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dmigs pa la rnal 'byor par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i 'od zer du'ang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzir yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tog gi rtse mo'i mchog tu'ang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dmigs pa la rnal 'byor par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i 'od zer du'ang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzir yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tog gi rtse mo'i mchog tu'ang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will become the sun’s rays of the thus-gone ones, the full moon of the thus-gone ones, the supreme tip of the thus-gone ones’ banner,🔽the boundary markers of the thus-gone ones, the diligent activity of the thus-gone ones, the power of the thus-gone ones, the white lotus of certainty in the thus-gone ones’ tīrthikas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshams 'dzin par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las la brtson par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtsal gyi shugs su'ang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mu stegs la nges pa'i padma dkar por yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshams 'dzin par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las la brtson par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtsal gyi shugs su'ang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mu stegs la nges pa'i padma dkar por yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: and the supreme and excellent lotus of the thus-gone ones’ followers.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgyes pa la dga' bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi dkor bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la rtag pa nyid du mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgyes pa la dga' bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi dkor bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la rtag pa nyid du mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa dang /
translated: They will delight in the Tathāgata’s delight. They will be the treasure of the Tathāgata’s wealth. They will see the Tathāgata as permanent.

original: ther zug pa nyid du shin tu gsal bar mthong nas bdag nyid bsngags pa brjod pa'i rgyal por yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
analyzed: ther zug pa nyid du shin tu gsal bar mthong nas bdag nyid bsngags pa brjod pa'i rgyal por yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
translated: Having seen the Tathāgata’s permanence and stability very clearly, they will become kings who proclaim their own praises, saying:🔽‘The Tathāgata has a stable body.

original: ther zug pa'i sku yin no //🔽zhes ther zug tu smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi ba'i rang bzhin @198a *//
analyzed: ther zug pa'i sku yin no // zhes ther zug tu smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhi ba'i rang bzhin @198a *//
translated: It is a body that is permanent.🔽Thus, they would be proponents of permanence.🔽

original: la mngon par dga' ba'i lta ba phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
analyzed: la mngon par dga' ba'i lta ba phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ni /
translated: They will speak of permanence. They will have the perfect view that delights in the Tathāgata’s peaceful nature. They will say:

original: rtag pa / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa dang / zhi ba'o //
analyzed: rtag pa / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa dang / zhi ba'o //
translated: ‘The Tathāgata is permanent, stable, enduring, and peaceful.🔽’

original: zhes rnam pa thams cad du lta ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du'ang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni /
analyzed: zhes rnam pa thams cad du lta ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du'ang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni /
translated: In this way, they will become a great ocean of views.

original: chos kyi su yin no //🔽zhes de kho na mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i sku ni /
analyzed: chos kyi su yin no // zhes de kho na mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i sku ni /
translated: The body of the Tathāgata is the body of Dharma.🔽In this way, they will see reality.

original: mi phyed pa'i sku yin no //
analyzed: mi phyed pa'i sku yin no //
translated: The vajra body of the Tathāgata is an indivisible body.

original: zhes yang dag par mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni /
analyzed: zhes yang dag par mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni /
translated: In this way, they will see the truth.🔽The body of the Tathāgata is not bone, not flesh, not blood, and not sinew.

original: rus pa ma yin zhing sha ma yin la khrag ma yin te rgyus pa ma yin no; ;zhes stong pa nyid du smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa ni /🔽'bras bu yod pa yin no //🔽zhes 'bras bu yod par smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa la ni /
analyzed: rus pa ma yin zhing sha ma yin la khrag ma yin te rgyus pa ma yin no; ;zhes stong pa nyid du smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa ni / 'bras bu yod pa yin no // zhes 'bras bu yod par smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos bstan pa la ni /
translated: In this way, they will speak of emptiness.🔽The Dharma teaching of the Tathāgata is fruitful.🔽In this way, they will speak of fruition.

original: 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: 'bras bu med par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: The Dharma teaching of the Tathāgata is not without fruition.

original: zhes med par smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ni /
analyzed: zhes med par smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la ni /
translated: And they would clearly be propounding:

original: gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: The Tathāgata does not pass into parinirvāṇa forever.🔽And they would be praising moral discipline:

original: zhes gsal bar smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su rab tu byung ba'i sems can rnams la ni /
analyzed: zhes gsal bar smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su rab tu byung ba'i sems can rnams la ni /
translated: Sentient beings who go forth in the Tathāgata’s teachings

original: tshul khrims nyams pa med do //
analyzed: tshul khrims nyams pa med do //
translated: do not have impaired moral discipline.🔽And they would be praising the non-setting of the teachings:

original: zhes tshul khrims kyi bsngags pa brjod par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ni /
analyzed: zhes tshul khrims kyi bsngags pa brjod par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la ni /
translated: The Tathāgata’s teachings

original: nub par 'gyur ba med do //
analyzed: nub par 'gyur ba med do //
translated: do not set.🔽And they would be praising the lineage of the Tathāgata:

original: zhes nub par mi 'gyur ba'i bsngags pa brjod par @198b yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / rgyud dag cing yongs su dag la dri ma med pas byang chub sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: zhes nub par mi 'gyur ba'i bsngags pa brjod par @198b yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang / rgyud dag cing yongs su dag la dri ma med pas byang chub sems dpa' ni /
translated: The bodhisattvas, whose lineage and continuum are pure, completely pure, and stainless,

original: thabs kyi rigs kyi rgyud yin no //
analyzed: thabs kyi rigs kyi rgyud yin no //
translated: are the lineage and continuum of skillful means.

original: zhes lta ba phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu 'khor ba la sdug pa'i sems par yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i bsngags pa brjod par yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i ched du thos pa'i rgya mtshor yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: zhes lta ba phun sum tshogs par yang 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu 'khor ba la sdug pa'i sems par yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i bsngags pa brjod par yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i ched du thos pa'i rgya mtshor yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will have the perfect view, they will always have a loving attitude toward saṃsāra, they will praise saṃsāra, they will become an ocean of learning for the sake of saṃsāra,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la dmigs par 'dod par yang 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu nyon mongs pa la sems par yang 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa la sdug pa'i sems par yang 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgo rnam pa sna tshogs 'thob pa la dad pa'i thob par yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la dmigs par 'dod par yang 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu nyon mongs pa la sems par yang 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa la sdug pa'i sems par yang 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgo rnam pa sna tshogs 'thob pa la dad pa'i thob par yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: they will wish to focus on the family of the tathāgatas, they will always have a loving attitude toward the afflictions, they will have a loving attitude toward the afflictions, they will have faith in obtaining the various gateways of the afflictions,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi zhing la smon lam 'debs pa'i sems su'ang 'gyur ba dang / las thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi zhing la smon lam 'debs pa'i sems su'ang 'gyur ba dang / las thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni /
translated: they will have a mind that makes aspirations for the field of activity of all the buddhas, and they will have a mind that is the root of all karma.

original: nyon mongs pa yin no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa yin no //
translated: The root of the afflictions is

original: zhes rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lta bar yang 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rtag pa nyid la'ang som nyi ma'i 'tshal zhing yid gnyis ma mchis la the tshom mi 'tshal bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba la mngon par dga' bar yang 'gyur ba dang /🔽'khor ba la mos par yang 'gyur ba dang / bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lta bar yang 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rtag pa nyid la'ang som nyi ma'i 'tshal zhing yid gnyis ma mchis la the tshom mi 'tshal bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba la mngon par dga' bar yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba la mos par yang 'gyur ba dang / bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o //
translated: They will not have the right view of the attainment of good fortune, and they will not be free of doubt, uncertainty, and perplexity about the Buddha’s permanence.🔽They will delight in saṃsāra,🔽they will aspire to saṃsāra,🔽and they will always have the thought of faith, ‘I will become a buddha.’

original: zhes rtag tu dad pa'i sems su'ang 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes rtag tu dad pa'i sems su'ang 'gyur ba dang / bdag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o //
translated: They will make aspirations and vows, ‘I will turn the wheel of the Dharma,

original: bdag gis sems can rnams dgrol bar bya'o //🔽bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis sems can rnams dgrol bar bya'o // bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi 'chad par bya'o //
translated: I will liberate beings,

original: zhes dam @199a *//🔽bca' zhing smon lam 'debs te /
analyzed: zhes dam @199a *//🔽bca' zhing smon lam 'debs te /
translated: and I will not let the lineage of the buddhas be broken.’

original: byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon du'ang 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi sman par yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho'i ston pa por yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i tshong rdal thob par lta bar yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon du'ang 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi sman par yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho'i ston pa por yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i tshong rdal thob par lta bar yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will become captains, doctors for the māras, guides for the ocean of the afflictions of saṃsāra, and merchants for the market of the afflictions of saṃsāra.

original: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po thob pas skom par yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba la sred par yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba thob pa la rag las pa'i sems su'ang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba thob pa mi gtong bar yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po thob pas skom par yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba la sred par yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba thob pa la rag las pa'i sems su'ang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba thob pa mi gtong bar yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will be thirsty for the great ocean of saṃsāra, crave saṃsāra, have minds that depend on obtaining saṃsāra, and not give up obtaining saṃsāra.

original: 'khor ba'i chul padma'i rgyal po rgyas par yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho bzhir yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa la rtag tu smon lam 'debs pa'i sems su'ang 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba la dga' bar yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i chul padma'i rgyal po rgyas par yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho bzhir yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa la rtag tu smon lam 'debs pa'i sems su'ang 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba la dga' bar yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will become the king of lotuses that opens in the light of the sun, the sun that opens the lotus of the light of the Dharma. They will become the four oceans of the afflictions of saṃsāra. They will become the mind that always makes aspirations for the afflictions of saṃsāra. They will become the delight of the beings in the hells.

original: sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba la sems shing rtag tu bsam pa gtong ba'i ngang tshul can du'ang 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i tshong rdal gyi tshong par yang 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba thob pa mi gtong bar yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba la sems shing rtag tu bsam pa gtong ba'i ngang tshul can du'ang 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i tshong rdal gyi tshong par yang 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba thob pa mi gtong bar yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will become the ones who always think of the beings in the hells and who are always inclined to think of them. They will become the merchants in the marketplace of the hells. They will become the ones who do not abandon the attainment of the hells.

original: sems can dmyal ba'i me la sems rgyas par yang 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i nyon mongs pas nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams la bde zhing bsil ba'i rlung du'ang 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i me drag po la sprin chen po las char kun tu 'bebs par yang @199b 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'i me la sems rgyas par yang 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i nyon mongs pas nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams la bde zhing bsil ba'i rlung du'ang 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i me drag po la sprin chen po las char kun tu 'bebs par yang @199b 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They become a vast mind for the fires of the hells, and they become a cool and refreshing breeze for those who are tormented by the afflictions of the hells. They become a great rain cloud that rains down on the intense fires of the hells.

original: sems can dmyal ba'i thog tog tu'ang 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i ston pa por yang 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i rgya mtsho'i mnyan pa chen por yang 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sman du'ang 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i zas su'ang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'i thog tog tu'ang 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i ston pa por yang 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i rgya mtsho'i mnyan pa chen por yang 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i sman du'ang 'gyur ba dang / sems can dmyal ba'i zas su'ang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They become a lightning flash for the hells, a teacher for the hells, a great ferryman for the ocean of the hells, a medicine for the hells, food for the hells,

original: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis zin pa'i mun pa mun nag bsal ba'i phyir sgron ma lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / srid pa'i 'gro ba snang bar bya ba'i phyir mar me lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa myur du gdugs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir bar snang lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis zin pa'i mun pa mun nag bsal ba'i phyir sgron ma lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / srid pa'i 'gro ba snang bar bya ba'i phyir mar me lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa myur du gdugs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir bar snang lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will be like a lamp in order to dispel the thick darkness of being caught up in all the sufferings and afflictions of saṃsāra. They will be like a butter lamp in order to illuminate the world of existence. They will be like the sky in order to be unstained by the various defilements of all the worlds of existence.

original: sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir mi gnas par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su rab tu byung ste tshul khrims dang / stobs dang / ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir kha ba'i phung po lta bu'i nyon mongs pa sel ba'i nyi ma lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir mi gnas par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su rab tu byung ste tshul khrims dang / stobs dang / ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir kha ba'i phung po lta bu'i nyon mongs pa sel ba'i nyi ma lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will be without abode because their minds are like space. They will be like the sun that dispels the afflictions that are like a heap of snow because they have gone forth following the Tathāgata and possess discipline, strength, and wisdom.

original: legs par smras pa yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes rgya mtsho dang ldan pa'i phyir rgya mtsho dug can lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / dkar po'i chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir zla ba lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: legs par smras pa yang dag par blangs pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes rgya mtsho dang ldan pa'i phyir rgya mtsho dug can lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / dkar po'i chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir zla ba lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They become independent, having taken up the well-spoken teachings; they become like an ocean, having an ocean of wisdom; they become like the moon, having completed the bright qualities;

original: gti mug gi mun pa sel ba'i phyir nyi ma lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pas 'khor ba la mngon par 'jug cing 'gro ba'i tshe bar snang lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / de dang de mngon par rtogs pas @200a *//
analyzed: gti mug gi mun pa sel ba'i phyir nyi ma lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pas 'khor ba la mngon par 'jug cing 'gro ba'i tshe bar snang lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / de dang de mngon par rtogs pas @200a *//
translated: they become like the sun, dispelling the darkness of delusion; they become like space, engaging in and proceeding through saṃsāra with afflictions;

original: padma lta bur gos pa med par yang 'gyur ba dang / sems can nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir mi gnas par yang 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad la nges par 'bigs pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba nyid rtag pa dang /
analyzed: padma lta bur gos pa med par yang 'gyur ba dang / sems can nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir mi gnas par yang 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad la nges par 'bigs pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba nyid rtag pa dang /
translated: They will be like a lotus, unstained; they will be like space, not dwelling anywhere; they will be like a vajra, penetrating all phenomena; they will be like the greatness of the qualities of the tathāgatas, permanent;

original: ther zug pa dang / bstan pa thos na mi g-yo ba'i phyir ri lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang rgyud la ye shes rnam par dag pa'i phyir bee d'urya lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa sel ba'i phyir rgya mtsho dug can pa'i gser gyi pha bong lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: ther zug pa dang / bstan pa thos na mi g-yo ba'i phyir ri lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang rgyud la ye shes rnam par dag pa'i phyir bee d'urya lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa sel ba'i phyir rgya mtsho dug can pa'i gser gyi pha bong lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will be like a lotus, unstained by anything; they will be like space, not dwelling anywhere; they will be like a vajra, penetrating all phenomena; they will be like a mountain, unshakable when hearing the greatness of the qualities of the thus-gone ones and their teachings; they will be like beryl, with the pure wisdom of the family and lineage of the thus-gone ones; they will be like a nugget of gold from the poisonous ocean, removing the turbidity of afflictions;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa'i rang bzhin mthong ba'i phyir zla ba lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos las mi g-yo ba'i phyir ri lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gtan du mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing chos nub par mi 'gyur ba thos na mi g-yo ba'i phyir sgo'i them pa lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa'i rang bzhin mthong ba'i phyir zla ba lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos las mi g-yo ba'i phyir ri lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gtan du mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing chos nub par mi 'gyur ba thos na mi g-yo ba'i phyir sgo'i them pa lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: Because they see the nature of the Thus-Gone One as permanent, stable, and enduring, they become like the moon. Because they do not waver from the Thus-Gone One’s teachings, they become like mountains. Because they do not waver when they hear that the Thus-Gone One never passes into parinirvāṇa and that the Dharma will never disappear, they become like door thresholds.

original: yang dag pa mthong ba'i phyir sems brtan zhing gnas par yang 'gyur ba dang / sems mi phyed pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang mngon sum du yon tan mang po thob pa mang bar yang 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang /
analyzed: yang dag pa mthong ba'i phyir sems brtan zhing gnas par yang 'gyur ba dang / sems mi phyed pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang mngon sum du yon tan mang po thob pa mang bar yang 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang /
translated: Because they see reality, their minds become stable and firm. Because their minds are indivisible, they become like vajras. They attain many qualities directly and become very learned. They become conscientious and modest.

original: khrel yod pa dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang / mdzes par yang 'gyur ba dang / blta na sdug par yang 'gyur ba dang / brkam pa med par yang @200b 'gyur ba dang / lus chung dur yang mi 'gyur ba dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: khrel yod pa dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang / mdzes par yang 'gyur ba dang / blta na sdug par yang 'gyur ba dang / brkam pa med par yang @200b 'gyur ba dang / lus chung dur yang mi 'gyur ba dang / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will have a sense of shame. They will be beautiful. They will be pleasant to behold. They will not be greedy. They will not have small bodies. They will have the most excellent and extensive good complexion.

original: rigs mthon por skye bar yang 'gyur ba dang / rigs chen por skye bar yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor mang bar yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor mi phyed par yang 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi nyams shing yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: rigs mthon por skye bar yang 'gyur ba dang / rigs chen por skye bar yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor mang bar yang 'gyur ba dang / 'khor mi phyed par yang 'gyur ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi nyams shing yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will be born into a high caste. They will be born into a great caste. They will have a large retinue. Their retinue will be inseparable. They will not regress from unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening. They will not fall away from it.

original: kha zas la brkam par yang mi 'gyur ba dang / sha'i kha zas kyang rnam par spong bar 'gyur ba dang / blo gros dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang / skye bo thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing cher bkur bar yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: kha zas la brkam par yang mi 'gyur ba dang / sha'i kha zas kyang rnam par spong bar 'gyur ba dang / blo gros dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang / skye bo thams cad kyi yid du 'ong zhing cher bkur bar yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will not be greedy for food, and they will give up eating meat. They will be intelligent, and they will be loved and respected by everyone.

original: dran pa dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang / gzi byin dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang / shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten dang mthun par 'jug par yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: dran pa dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang / gzi byin dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang / shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten dang mthun par 'jug par yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will be mindful, majestic, and wise. They will be happy and in harmony with the world.

original: 'jig rten la phan par 'dod par yang 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten la bde bar yang 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi thu bo yang 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi gtso bor yang 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi mchog tu'ang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten la phan par 'dod par yang 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten la bde bar yang 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi thu bo yang 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi gtso bor yang 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi mchog tu'ang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will be dedicated to the welfare of the world, and they will be happy in the world. They will be the leaders of the world, the foremost of the world, the best of the world.

original: 'jig rten gyi rab tu'ang 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os par yang 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod pa'i gnas su'ang 'gyur ba dang / sbyin bdag chen por yang 'gyur ba dang / stobs chen po dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang /🔽dpa' bo chen por @201a *//
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi rab tu'ang 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyis phyag bya bar 'os par yang 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchod pa'i gnas su'ang 'gyur ba dang / sbyin bdag chen por yang 'gyur ba dang / stobs chen po dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang / dpa' bo chen por @201a *//
translated: They will become the most excellent in the world, worthy of the world’s homage, worthy of the world’s offerings, great benefactors, and endowed with great strength.🔽They will become great heroes,

original: yang 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan par yang 'gyur pa dang / byams pa'i sems dang yang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bden par smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang / brtul zhugs brtan par yang 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus brtsams par yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: yang 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan par yang 'gyur pa dang / byams pa'i sems dang yang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / bden par smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang / brtul zhugs brtan par yang 'gyur ba dang / brtson 'grus brtsams par yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: endowed with great diligence, loving, truthful, steadfast in their vows, and diligent.

original: byams pa la gnas par yang 'gyur ba dang / snying rje la gnas par yang 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba la yang gnas par 'gyur ba dang / btang snyoms la yang gnas par 'gyur ba dang / stong pa'i chos rnams la stong par smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: byams pa la gnas par yang 'gyur ba dang / snying rje la gnas par yang 'gyur ba dang / dga' ba la yang gnas par 'gyur ba dang / btang snyoms la yang gnas par 'gyur ba dang / stong pa'i chos rnams la stong par smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will abide in love, compassion, joy, and equanimity. They will speak of empty phenomena as empty and of nonempty phenomena as nonempty.

original: stong pa ma lags pa'i chos rnams la stong pa ma lags par smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi don rtogs par smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi de kho na'i chos kyi lta ba smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: stong pa ma lags pa'i chos rnams la stong pa ma lags par smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi don rtogs par smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi de kho na'i chos kyi lta ba smra bar yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will speak of the realization of the meaning of the buddhadharmas and of the view of the buddhas’ dharmas that are the way things are.

original: gtsang bar yang 'gyur ba dang / gtsang mas phyug par yang 'gyur ba dang / yon tan gyis phyug par yang 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyis phyug par yang 'gyur ba dang / chos kyis phyug par yang 'gyur ba dang / dbrog tu ma mchis pa'i rdzas kyis phyug par yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: gtsang bar yang 'gyur ba dang / gtsang mas phyug par yang 'gyur ba dang / yon tan gyis phyug par yang 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims kyis phyug par yang 'gyur ba dang / chos kyis phyug par yang 'gyur ba dang / dbrog tu ma mchis pa'i rdzas kyis phyug par yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will become pure, wealthy through purity, wealthy through good qualities, wealthy through discipline, wealthy through the Dharma, and wealthy through inexhaustible wealth.

original: skye bo dbul po slong ba la sogs pa la gter lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams tshon pa na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: skye bo dbul po slong ba la sogs pa la gter lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams tshon pa na mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar yang mi 'gyur ba dang /
translated: When they hear about emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, they will not be afraid, terrified, or scared.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar @201b bgyi bas sems bskyed pa de dang der skye bar yang 'gyur ba dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa don du mi gnyer bar yang 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams bsdus nas dam pa'i chos la 'god par yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar @201b bgyi bas sems bskyed pa de dang der skye bar yang 'gyur ba dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa don du mi gnyer bar yang 'gyur ba dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba rnams bsdus nas dam pa'i chos la 'god par yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will be reborn wherever they wish to be reborn in the buddhafields where they have developed the mind of awakening.🔽They will not pursue gain, honor, or fame. They will gather those with unethical conduct and establish them in the sacred Dharma.

original: tshul khrims 'chal pa g-yo sgyu dang ldan pa rnams la thog tog lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa mi gzo ba la yang dag par sbyor bar yang 'gyur ba dang / mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad du mi 'phrog par yang 'gyur zhing slar de la thabs dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: tshul khrims 'chal pa g-yo sgyu dang ldan pa rnams la thog tog lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa mi gzo ba la yang dag par sbyor bar yang 'gyur ba dang / mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad du mi 'phrog par yang 'gyur zhing slar de la thabs dang ldan par yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will be like a thunderbolt to those with unethical conduct and deceit. They will be dedicated to repaying the kindness of the Thus-Gone One. They will be unassailable in all the abodes of the tīrthikas and will be skilled in the means to return there.

original: dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / mu stegs can phas kyi rgol ba mang po dag gis phug rdugs su mi chud cing slar de la thabs kyis rton par yang 'gyur ba dang / mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad kyi gsang tshig rnams la 'dun par mi 'gyur zhing slar de la thabs kyis 'dun par bgyid par yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: dge sbyong dang / bram ze dang / mu stegs can phas kyi rgol ba mang po dag gis phug rdugs su mi chud cing slar de la thabs kyis rton par yang 'gyur ba dang / mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad kyi gsang tshig rnams la 'dun par mi 'gyur zhing slar de la thabs kyis 'dun par bgyid par yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will not be attracted to the secret mantras of all the tīrthikas, and they will be able to skillfully attract them.

original: lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i gnas thams cad la brten par mi 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i gnas thams cad la brten par mi 'gyur zhing /
translated: They will not rely on the abodes of all the gods, nāgas, yakṣas, and gandharvas,🔽and they will be able to skillfully rely on them.

original: slar de la thabs kyis yang dag par brten pa lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / las la ston par 'gyur gyi bkra shis dang / dge mtshan la rton par yang mi 'gyur ba dang / srog gcod pa bgyid kyang srog gcod pa spangs par yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: slar de la thabs kyis yang dag par brten pa lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / las la ston par 'gyur gyi bkra shis dang / dge mtshan la rton par yang mi 'gyur ba dang / srog gcod pa bgyid kyang srog gcod pa spangs par yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will be able to teach karma, and they will not rely on auspicious signs and good fortune. They will be able to take life, and yet they will be able to abandon taking life.

original: me tog phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye mas gdab pa dang / khyim pa'i longs spyod dang / yongs su spyad pa rnam pa du ma dag dang / chung ma dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i yon tan @202a *//
analyzed: me tog phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye mas gdab pa dang / khyim pa'i longs spyod dang / yongs su spyad pa rnam pa du ma dag dang / chung ma dang lhan cig 'dod pa'i yon tan @202a *//
translated: He may enjoy the pleasures of the five senses with his wife, but he will still be a pure celibate.

original: spyad kyang shin tu tshangs par spyod par yang 'gyur ba dang / srog gcod pa dang / rku 'phrog bgyid pa dang / rdzun gyi tshig dang / skyems 'tshal ba la sogs pa la brten cing las rnams bgyid pa lta bu dang / chung ma rnams bsten kyang shin tu tshangs par spyod par yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: spyad kyang shin tu tshangs par spyod par yang 'gyur ba dang / srog gcod pa dang / rku 'phrog bgyid pa dang / rdzun gyi tshig dang / skyems 'tshal ba la sogs pa la brten cing las rnams bgyid pa lta bu dang / chung ma rnams bsten kyang shin tu tshangs par spyod par yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: He may engage in activities such as killing, stealing, lying, and drinking alcohol, but he will still be a pure celibate.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod par yang 'gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjed par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis cher bkur bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdug par bya ba'i sras su'ang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod par yang 'gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjed par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis cher bkur bar yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdug par bya ba'i sras su'ang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will become an object of worship for all the tathāgatas, they will be honored by all the tathāgatas, they will be greatly revered by all the tathāgatas, they will become a beloved child of all the tathāgatas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la byas pa gzo ba'i bgo skal la spyod par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las mtshungs pa'i chos kyi de kho na ma thong bar yang 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yang dag par rtog pa mtshungs par yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la byas pa gzo ba'i bgo skal la spyod par yang 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'phrin las mtshungs pa'i chos kyi de kho na ma thong bar yang 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes kyi yang dag par rtog pa mtshungs par yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: they will enjoy the inheritance of being grateful to all the tathāgatas, they will see the reality of the Dharma that is the same activity as all the tathāgatas, and they will have the same realization of the wisdom of all the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos gsang ba rnam pa mang po lung bstan pa'i yul la spyis btsan pa'i rgyal por yang 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos tshon pa rnam pa du ma brjod par yang 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bzhed pa'i nga rgyal la gnas pa'i yul la mkhas par yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos gsang ba rnam pa mang po lung bstan pa'i yul la spyis btsan pa'i rgyal por yang 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos tshon pa rnam pa du ma brjod par yang 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bzhed pa'i nga rgyal la gnas pa'i yul la mkhas par yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will become kings who are powerful in the domain of the prophecies of the many secret dharmas of all the buddhas; they will become those who express the many secret dharmas of all the buddhas; they will become those who are skilled in the domain of abiding in the pride that is desired by all the buddhas;

original: sangs rgyas thams @202b cad kyi 'dod chags ma mchis pa dang / dri ma ma mchis pa dang / 'jigs pa ma mchis pa gsang ba rnam pa mang po'i chos ston pa'i rang bzhin dag la rin po che lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems can gdul ba'i dbang gis 'dod chags dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams @202b cad kyi 'dod chags ma mchis pa dang / dri ma ma mchis pa dang / 'jigs pa ma mchis pa gsang ba rnam pa mang po'i chos ston pa'i rang bzhin dag la rin po che lta bur yang 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems can gdul ba'i dbang gis 'dod chags dang /
translated: they will become like jewels in the nature of the teachings of the many secret dharmas of the nonattachment, the nondefilement, and the fearlessness of all the buddhas; they will become those who, by the power of taming beings, are skilled in the domain of the nonattachment, the nondefilement, and the fearlessness of all the buddhas;

original: zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'jigs pa'i chos kyi phyogs thams cad la 'jug pa yang dag par mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yun ring po bskal pa bye ba grangs pa mang po nas rgal nas nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las grol bar mdzad pa'i gsang ba thams cad kyi de kho na mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / 'jigs pa'i chos kyi phyogs thams cad la 'jug pa yang dag par mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad yun ring po bskal pa bye ba grangs pa mang po nas rgal nas nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho las grol bar mdzad pa'i gsang ba thams cad kyi de kho na mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They will see all the aspects of the Dharma of anger, desire, and ignorance. They will see the truth of all the buddhas, who, for many eons, have crossed over and liberated beings from the ocean of afflictions.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtshor skye ba bstan te rgal nas bsgral bar bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtshor skye ba bstan te rgal nas bsgral bar bya'o //
translated: All the buddhas, by the power of taming beings, demonstrate birth in the ocean of afflictions, cross over, and liberate.

original: grol nas dgral bar bya'o //
analyzed: grol nas dgral bar bya'o //
translated: They cross over and liberate.

original: snyam nas bstan pa'i gsang ba'i khyad par gyi sgo'i rang bzhin dag mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yun ring po bskal pa bye ba bgrang ba mang po 'das pa nas bdud bye ba rab tu bcom pa'i rnam pa gsang ba'i de kho na mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: snyam nas bstan pa'i gsang ba'i khyad par gyi sgo'i rang bzhin dag mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yun ring po bskal pa bye ba bgrang ba mang po 'das pa nas bdud bye ba rab tu bcom pa'i rnam pa gsang ba'i de kho na mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang /
translated: and they will see the secret of the way in which all buddhas, for many eons, for many millions of eons, have defeated millions of māras.🔽They will see the way in which all buddhas, in order to guide beings, have demonstrated the way in which they have defeated māras at the foot of the Bodhi tree.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud 'dul ba'i gsang ba'i khyad par gyi sgo'i rang bzhin ston pa lta bur bcos pa legs par mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang / thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis byang chub kyi shing drung du bdud 'dul ba'i gsang ba'i khyad par gyi sgo'i rang bzhin ston pa lta bur bcos pa legs par mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang / thabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
translated: They will see the way in which the buddhas have turned the wheel of Dharma through skillful means,

original: thabs kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa lta bur bcos pa'i @203a *//
analyzed: thabs kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa lta bur bcos pa'i @203a *//
translated: and the way in which they have demonstrated the parinirvāṇa through skillful means.

original: de kho na mthong bar yang 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad rol pa'i gsang ba'i rgyal po'i mchog tu'ang 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa /

analyzed: thabs kyi rigs kyi rgyud yin no //

original: 'khor ba'i bsngags pa brjod par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i bsngags pa brjod par yang 'gyur ro //

original: 'khor ba'i ched du thos pa'i rgya mtshor yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i ched du thos pa'i rgya mtshor yang 'gyur ro //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la dmigs par 'dod par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la dmigs par 'dod par yang 'gyur ro //

original: rtag tu nyon mongs pa la sems par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtag tu nyon mongs pa la sems par yang 'gyur ro //

original: nyon mongs pa la sdug par sems par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa la sdug par sems par yang 'gyur ro //

analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i sgo rnam pa sna tshogs thob pa la dad pa thob par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: They will have faith in the various gateways of the afflictions that are attained.

analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'phrin las kyi zhing la smon lam 'debs pa'i sems su'ang 'gyur ro //

original: las thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni /
analyzed: las thams cad kyi rtsa ba ni /
translated: The root of all actions

original: nyon mongs pa yin no //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa yin no //

analyzed: zhes rnyed pa legs par rnyed par lta bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: They will have the view that it is good to acquire the afflictions.

original: sangs rgyas kyi rtag pa nyid la'ang som nyi mi za zhing yid gnyis med la the tshom za bar yang mi 'gyur ro //🔽'khor ba la mngon par dga' bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rtag pa nyid la'ang som nyi mi za zhing yid gnyis med la the tshom za bar yang mi 'gyur ro // 'khor ba la mngon par dga' bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: They will not doubt the Buddha’s permanence, and will not be confused or uncertain.🔽They will delight in saṃsāra.

original: 'khor ba la mos par yang 'gyur ro //🔽bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'khor ba la mos par yang 'gyur ro // bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar bya'o //

original: zhes rtag tu dad pa'i sems su'ang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhes rtag tu dad pa'i sems su'ang 'gyur ro //

original: bdag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o //
translated: They will make the vow and aspiration: ‘I will turn the wheel of the Dharma.

original: @225b bdag gis sems can rnams dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: @225b bdag gis sems can rnams dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: I will liberate beings.

original: bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi gcad par bya'o //🔽zhes dam 'cha' zhing smon lam 'debs te /
analyzed: bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi gdung mi gcad par bya'o // zhes dam 'cha' zhing smon lam 'debs te /

original: byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon du'ang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ded dpon du'ang 'gyur ro //
translated: They will become a captain for the bodhisattvas.

original: bdud kyi sman par yang 'gyur ro //🔽'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho'i ston pa por yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bdud kyi sman par yang 'gyur ro // 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho'i ston pa por yang 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be a doctor for the māras.🔽They will be a guide for the ocean of the afflictions of saṃsāra.

original: 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i tshong rdal thob par lta bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i tshong rdal thob par lta bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: They will be a lookout for the marketplace of the afflictions of saṃsāra.

original: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po thob pas sgom par yang 'gyur ro //🔽'khor ba la sred par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po thob pas sgom par yang 'gyur ro // 'khor ba la sred par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be born in the great ocean of saṃsāra.🔽He will be attached to saṃsāra.

original: 'khor ba thob pa la rag las pa'i sems su'ang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba thob pa la rag las pa'i sems su'ang 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be a person who is dependent on saṃsāra.

original: 'khor ba thob pa mi gtong bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba thob pa mi gtong bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not give up the attainment of saṃsāra.

original: 'khor ba'i chu la padma'i rgyal po rgyas par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i chu la padma'i rgyal po rgyas par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be a fully bloomed king of lotuses in the water of saṃsāra.

original: 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho'i gzhir yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rgya mtsho'i gzhir yang 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be the ground of the ocean of the afflictions of saṃsāra.

original: 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa la rtag tu smon lam 'debs pa'i sems su'ang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa la rtag tu smon lam 'debs pa'i sems su'ang 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be a person who always makes aspirations for the afflictions of saṃsāra.

original: sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba la dga' bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba la dga' bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: He will delight in the destinies of the hells.

original: sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba la sems shing rtag tu bsam pa gtong ba'i ngang tshul can du'ang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro ba la sems shing rtag tu bsam pa gtong ba'i ngang tshul can du'ang 'gyur ro //
translated: He will always be a person who thinks about the destinies of the hells and who is intent on them.

original: sems can dmyal ba'i tshong rdal gyi tshong bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'i tshong rdal gyi tshong bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: He will be a merchant in the marketplace of the hells.

original: sems can dmyal ba thob pa mi gtong bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba thob pa mi gtong bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: He will not give up the attainment of the hells.

original: sems can dmyal ba'i me la sems rgyas par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'i me la sems rgyas par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: They become a vast mind for the fires of the hells.

original: sems can dmyal ba'i nyon mongs pas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba rnams la bde zhing bsil ba'i rlung du'ang 'gyur ro //🔽sems can dmyal ba'i me drag po la sprin chen po las char kun tu 'bebs par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'i nyon mongs pas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba rnams la bde zhing bsil ba'i rlung du'ang 'gyur ro // sems can dmyal ba'i me drag po la sprin chen po las char kun tu 'bebs par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: They become a cool breeze for those tormented by the afflictions of the hells.🔽They become a great rain cloud for the raging fires of the hells.

original: sems can dmyal ba'i thog tog tu'ang @226a *//
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'i thog tog tu'ang @226a *//
translated: They become a great lightning flash for the hells.

original: 'gyur ro // sems can dmyal ba'i ston pa por yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gyur ro // sems can dmyal ba'i ston pa por yang 'gyur ro //
translated: They become a teacher for the hells.

original: sems can dmyal ba'i rgya mtsho'i mnyan pa chen por yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'i rgya mtsho'i mnyan pa chen por yang 'gyur ro //
translated: They become a great ferryman for the ocean of the hells.

original: sems can dmyal ba'i sman par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'i sman par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: They become a doctor for the hells.

original: sems can dmyal ba'i zas su'ang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'i zas su'ang 'gyur ro //
translated: They become food for the hells.

original: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis zin pa'i mun pa mun nag bsal pa'i phyir sgron me lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis zin pa'i mun pa mun nag bsal pa'i phyir sgron me lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
translated: They become a lamp for dispelling the darkness of the suffering of saṃsāra and the afflictions.

original: snang bar bya ba'i phyir mar me lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snang bar bya ba'i phyir mar me lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
translated: It is like a lamp, because it illuminates.

original: srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa myur du gdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir bar snang lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa myur du gdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir bar snang lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
translated: It is like the sky, because the afflictions of all beings in the realms of existence cannot sully it.

original: sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir mi gnas par yang 'gyur ro //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su rab tu byung ste /
analyzed: sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir mi gnas par yang 'gyur ro // de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su rab tu byung ste /
translated: It is without abode, because the mind is like space.

original: tshul khrims dang / stobs dang / ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir kha ba'i phung po lta bu'i nyon mongs sel ba'i nyi ma lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tshul khrims dang / stobs dang / ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir kha ba'i phung po lta bu'i nyon mongs sel ba'i nyi ma lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
translated: It is like the sun, because it dispels the afflictions that are like a heap of snow, since it possesses morality, strength, and wisdom.

original: legs par smras pa yang dag par blang ba'i phyir gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: legs par smras pa yang dag par blang ba'i phyir gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: It is not dependent on others, because it has taken up the well-spoken teachings.

original: ye shes rgya mtsho dang ldan pa'i phyir rgya mtsho dug can lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ye shes rgya mtsho dang ldan pa'i phyir rgya mtsho dug can lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
translated: It is like an ocean, because it possesses an ocean of wisdom.

original: dkar po'i chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir zla ba lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dkar po'i chos yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir zla ba lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
translated: In order to complete the virtuous qualities, they become like the moon.

original: gti mug gi mun pa sel ba'i phyir nyi ma lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gti mug gi mun pa sel ba'i phyir nyi ma lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
translated: In order to dispel the darkness of ignorance, they become like the sun.

original: nyon mongs pas 'khor ba la mngon par 'jug cing 'gro ba'i tshe bar snang lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pas 'khor ba la mngon par 'jug cing 'gro ba'i tshe bar snang lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
translated: When they enter saṃsāra and go to the realms of beings, they become like the sky.

original: de dang de mngon par rtogs pas padma lta bur gos pa med par yang 'gyur @226b ro; ;sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir mi gnas par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dang de mngon par rtogs pas padma lta bur gos pa med par yang 'gyur @226b ro; ;sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir mi gnas par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Through realizing this and that, they become like a lotus, unstained. Because the mind is like space, they become non-abiding.

original: chos thams cad la nges par 'bigs pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad la nges par 'bigs pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
translated: In order to penetrate all phenomena, they become like a vajra.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba nyid rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa thos na mi g-yo ba'i phyir ri lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi che ba nyid rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa thos na mi g-yo ba'i phyir ri lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
translated: When they hear the greatness of the qualities of the tathāgatas, which are permanent, stable, and firm, they become unshakable, like a mountain.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang rgyud la ye shes rnam par dag pa'i phyir bee d'urya lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang rgyud la ye shes rnam par dag pa'i phyir bee d'urya lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
translated: And because the lineage and continuum of the Tathāgata are pure pristine cognition, they are like beryl.

original: nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa sel ba'i phyir rgya mtsho dug can pa'i gser gyi pha bong lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i rnyog pa sel ba'i phyir rgya mtsho dug can pa'i gser gyi pha bong lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
translated: And because they dispel the turbidity of defilement, they are like nuggets of gold from the Jambu River.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa'i rang bzhin mthong ba'i phyir zla ba lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtag pa dang / ther zug pa dang / brtan pa'i rang bzhin mthong ba'i phyir zla ba lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
translated: And because they see the Tathāgata’s nature of permanence, steadfastness, and quiescence, they are like the moon.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos las mi g-yo ba'i phyir ri lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos las mi g-yo ba'i phyir ri lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
translated: And because they do not move from the Tathāgata’s Dharma, they are like mountains.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa gtan du mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing chos nub par mi 'gyur ba thos nas mi g-yo ba'i phyir sgo'i them pa lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa gtan du mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing chos nub par mi 'gyur ba thos nas mi g-yo ba'i phyir sgo'i them pa lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
translated: And because they do not move when they hear that the Tathāgata does not pass into complete nirvāṇa and that the Dharma will not disappear, they are like door bolts.

original: yang dag pa mthong ba'i phyir sems brtan zhing gnas par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yang dag pa mthong ba'i phyir sems brtan zhing gnas par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: And because they see reality, their minds are firm and stable.

original: sems mi phyed pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems mi phyed pa'i phyir rdo rje lta bur yang 'gyur ro //
translated: And because their minds are indivisible, they are like vajras.

original: mngon sum du yon tan mang po thob pa mang bar yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon sum du yon tan mang po thob pa mang bar yang 'gyur ro //
translated: They will have many qualities that are directly perceptible.

original: ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ngo tsha shes pa dang khrel yod pa dang ldan par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: They will have a sense of shame and a sense of decency.

original: mdzes par yang 'gyur ro //
